message.body: Hey dude! I haven't talked to you in forever! How are you?

Hi Sammy~ I'm tired and about to leave work. It's been kinda busy.
How are you doing? Chase doin' good?
You know, my eggs have been cracking while getting hardboiled. It's a little frustrating.
Well at least you an chill at home now! Chase is doing well. My cousin is staying with us for a while so he's got a new friend, lol. That's weird about t
he eggs. How intense is the heat that you've been using to boil them?
Uh...I turn the heat dial until it doesn't turn anymore.
Haha well I think you should maybe turn it down to a lower boil once you first get it boiling. She's cool. I haven't seen she since I was really little,
so it's been fun catching up.
